data.title: Directors, Officers, & Management
data.meta_description: Silver Lake Bank’s directors and officers are here to make your banking experience exceed expectations. Contact us for all your banking needs.
data.text:
C. Scott Hughes, Vice President, Loan Officer

NMLS #790986

Scott graduated from Central Missouri State University with a degree in Business Administration. Located at our Southwest Office, his expertise is in Small Business Lending and Real Estate Investment property transactions but can assist customers with all types of loan requests.

Phone: 785.379.8152

Email: cshughes@silverlakebank.com

Shane C. Koci, Vice President, Online Banking Services Manager

Shane joined the bank in 2008 after spending three years at a local financial institution serving in various operational capacities. He is a graduate of Kansas State University with a BS in Business Administration. Shane is responsible for online banking services and works with our high school student banks

Phone: 785.379.8162

Email: sckoci@silverlakebank.com

Kelli A. Lambrecht, Assistant Vice President, Credit Officer

Kelli joined the bank in 2013 after spending five years in the banking industry serving in various capacities and roles. She is a graduate of Kansas State University with a BS in Business Administration. Kelli is located at the Main office in North Topeka where she is involved with portfolio and risk management as well as consumer and commercial lending.

Phone: 785.379.8168

Email: kalambrecht@silverlakebank.com

Cindy Lawson, Vice President / Credit Administrator

Cindy has been with the Bank since 1987 as a member of our loan department. Today, she remains involved in the loan/credit side of the Bank, with her primary focus working with the lenders on their real estate transactions.

Phone: 785.379.8135

Email: cmlawson@silverlakebank.com

Christa J. Manning, Vice President/Assistant Operations Manager, Security

Christa has been in banking operations for more than 40 years with 29 of those years with Silver Lake Bank. She is responsible for bank security, and oversight of retail/deposit operations. Though her office is in the loft at our Jayhawk location, you never know at which location you’ll find her.

Phone: 785.379.8140

Email: cjmanning@silverlakebank.com

Lainie McPherson, Assistant Vice President/Senior Credit Analyst

Lainie joined the bank in 2013 with four years of prior banking experience. Lainie is a Kansas State University graduate with degrees in Accounting and Finance. Lainie is responsible for credit analysis and risk management to maintain the quality of the bank’s loan portfolio.

Phone: 785.379.8169

Email: lrmcpherson@silverlakebank.com

Mark Metzler, Assistant Vice President, Loan Officer

NMLS #580136

Mark, who has lived in Northeast Kansas for much of his life, joined Silver Lake Bank in 2022. He graduated from Kansas State University with a degree in Agricultural Education and has worked in community banking since 1985. He worked in all aspects of banking from being a teller, Operations/IT, consumer loans, commercial loans to ag loans and janitorial duties.

Phone: 785.379.8151

Email: mdmetzler@silverlakebank.com

Branch Managers

Sierra K Tucker, Jayhawk Branch Assistant Manager

Sierra joined Silver Lake Bank in 2021 with more than three years’ customer service experience. Her responsibilities include providing excellent customer service, building customer relationships, and managing customer service reps and tellers at our main branch. Sierra grew up in Princeton and attended Washburn University. When she isn’t working she enjoys listening to crime podcasts and spending time with her boyfriend and dogs.

Phone: 785.379.8184

Email: sktucker@silverlakebank.com

Rachel Garrison, Southwest Branch Manager

​Rachel grew up in north Topeka and graduated from Seaman High School and Washburn University. She serves as the branch manager for the Southwest branch with a primary emphasis on working with businesses on their account needs, specifically Health Savings Accounts. When she isn’t working, she enjoys her two Great Danes as well as watching movies, doing arts and crafts with her Cricut, and spending time with family and friends.

Phone: 785.379.8188

Email: rlgarrison@silverlakebank.com

Roberta B. Haflich, Vice President, Gage Branch Manager

Prior to joining the bank in 2006, Roberta (Bert) had spent over 30 years in the financial services field. Bert is a graduate of Holton High School and has spent her entire career in Topeka. She is able to work with customers on filling both deposit and loan needs and has overall responsibility for the customer IRA accounts maintained by the bank.

Phone: 785.379.8155

Email: rbhaflich@silverlakebank.com

Lucas D. Mitchell, Silver Lake Branch Manager

Lucas joined the bank in 2015 as a Customer Service Representative. He has been a Silver Lake native since his early childhood. He graduated from Washburn University in 2013 with an Associates of Science with an Emphasis in Design Technology.

Phone: 785.379.8172

Email: ldmitchell@silverlakebank.com

Rachel Vazquez, Lawrence Branch Manager

Rachel joined the Lawrence branch in 2022, following a number of years in both customer service and working with financial institutions. She grew up in Douglas County’s Stull/Le Compton area and is a multi-generational Shawnee Heights High School graduate. She followed with post-secondary studies in nursing at Kaw Area Technical School. She loves the vibe of downtown Lawrence and working with customers on their deposit needs. She is happily married with 8 children, grandchildren and two pit bulls – Leroy and Hank.

Phone: 785.379.8185

Email: rlvazquez@silverlakebank.com
